items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: Qodalis-Solutions/qodalis-angular-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-js: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: A lightweight Kanban board built with React and TypeScript featuring custom drag-and-drop functionality without external DnD libraries.
items.title: azlibdar/pure-kanban: A lightweight Kanban board built with React and TypeScript featuring custom drag-and-drop functionality without external DnD libraries.

items.content_html: A lightweight React hook for detecting autofill events on form inputs in modern browsers. This package provides an easy-to-use API to track autofill status on HTML elements, handle autofill events, and create responsive UI feedback.
items.title: sundarshahi/detect-autofill-react: A lightweight React hook for detecting autofill events on form inputs in modern browsers. This package provides an easy-to-use API to track autofill status on HTML elements, handle autofill events, and create responsive UI feedback.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
